field.p:
üì¶ What are Container Types?
Container types define the physical boxes/containers used for document storage.
Each type has specific dimensions, capacity, and billing rates.

ol.li: Enter Type Name (e.g., "Standard Letter Box", "Legal File Box", "Archive Box")

Set Physical Dimensions:
Length: inches (e.g., 15")
Width: inches (e.g., 12")
Height: inches (e.g., 10")
System calculates: Cubic feet automatically
Enter Max Weight (pounds - for handling safety)
Set Default Storage Rate (monthly charge per box)
Choose Barcode Format (if using barcode labels)

field.p:

üí∞ Billing Considerations:

‚Ä¢ Set default rate in container type, override in billing config

üí° Quick Tips:
‚Ä¢ Start with 2-3 standard types, add specialized types as needed
